item.description: When I was in college, I took a pretty fantastic English course.

item.title: Rocketbook
item.description: My friend Chris got me the snazziest notebook for Christmas, and after a couple weeks with it, I am LOVING it.

item.title: Eclectic Magic
item.description: I’ve always enjoyed writing. When I was a little kid I would make up stories all the time, and occasionally, with the right pressure, I would write them down.

item.title: Quality Wordsmithing
item.description: Well, now that I have a new blog setup, the journey to something presentable is underway.

item.title: Stuck In Neutral - Part 2
item.description: I turned around to see two more people standing up, frothing at the mouth.

item.title: I Wrote a Thing!
